Edit division description — Carbon Pollution Reduction Scheme Legislation — 25 Nov 2009

Describe the result of this division. This will require you to check through the debate leading up to the vote. The raw, and frequently wrong, motion text is there by default. Feel free to remove it when you've replaced it with something better.

Please, keep it accurate, authorative, and as jargon-free as possible so that new readers who don't know Parliamentary procedure can gain enlightenment. You are urged to include links to the legislation, reports, and committee proceedings that are referred to so that readers who want to follow the story further will know where to look.

Read the debate leading up to the vote.

Useful links for you to research

  • Bills before Parliament
  • Current House Committee Inquiries
  • Current Senate Committee Inquiries
  • House Powers, Practice and Procedure
  • Senate Powers, Practice and Procedure
  • House Official Hansard
  • Senate Official Hansard

Formatting codes. You can use the following to mark paragraphs, lists and so on.

  • ''italic'' - italic
  • [http://example.com A link] - link
  • * A point - bulleted list item
  • An idea[1] - link to a footnote
  • * [1] Ideas are good - footnote
  • @A comment - comments aren't displayed
  • @MP voted aye to say that little ponies are great - puts this text on the motion page "[MP Name] voted to say that little ponies are great"
  • @MP voted no - does it for MPs that voted no
